title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 85.3 - Illegal and void contracts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 85.3 - Illegal and void contracts

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 484(c)

Any contract, agreement, arrangement, combination or
common understanding, expressed or implied, made by any person in violation of
any provision of article 20-A of the Tax Law, or this article, is declared to
be an illegal and void contract, and no recovery shall be had
thereon. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
85.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
